Social Media Plan for Cloudnine Fertility:

Facebook:

Facebook will be a key platform for our social media campaign as it has a large user base and provides a range of advertising options. Our Facebook content will be focused on engaging potential patients and showcasing Cloudnine Fertility's services and expertise. Some examples of the kind of content we will post include:

* Patient success stories and testimonials
* Information about the clinic's services and facilities
* Live videos featuring doctors and specialists answering common questions about fertility treatments
* Infographics and visual content showcasing statistics and facts about fertility treatments and services

Fertility OPD Campaigns:

We will run Fertility OPD campaigns for Cloudnine Fertility's clinics in all the cities. The advertising spend for lead generation from each platform is as follows:

* Google: INR 1,000 per city per month. We can expect 3-4 leads per day from this platform. The campaign will include targeted search ads and display ads to reach potential patients who are actively searching for fertility clinics and treatments in the area.
* Facebook: INR 1,200 per city per month. We can expect 5-8 leads per day from this platform. The campaign will include targeted ads that reach potential patients based on demographics, interests, and behavior.
* YouTube: INR 500 per city per month. We can expect 3-5 leads per day from this platform. The campaign will include targeted video ads that reach potential patients who are searching for information about fertility treatments and services.

Note: These costs are exclusive of any additional fees that may be charged by the advertising platforms. The pricing table is subject to change based on the performance of the campaigns and any changes in the advertising platforms' pricing structure.

The agency will facilitate Cloudnine Fertility in the sales conversion process. If the client chooses to allocate the entire scope of work for all 5 campaigns, a dedicated manager will be assigned to oversee the process. The manager will regularly call the sales person from Cloudnine to enquire about the status of leads and ensure that the sales process is moving smoothly.

In addition, the agency will provide an IVR (Interactive Voice Response) and call back tracker to ensure proper tracking of leads generated through the campaigns. This will allow the agency and the client to measure the effectiveness of the campaigns and make necessary adjustments to improve their performance.
